alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 12:26PM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow and strong winds expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches. 3 to 7 inches above 9500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
